Headline: #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland Temporary Reroute at Northwest/Ardmore
ShortDescription: 86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Austin, Bryn Mawr and Nagle: due to, street blockage near Northwest/Ardmore.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#86 Narragansett/Ridgeland |buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Austin, Bryn Mawr and Nagle: due to, street blockage near Northwest/Ardmore.

Headline: #172 U. of Chicago/Kenwood Temporary Northbound Reroute near Woodlawn/56th
ShortDescription: NB 172 U. of Chicago/Kenwood buses are temporarily rerouted via 59th, University, 55th & Woodlawn, due to street blockage near Woodlawn/56th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #172 U. of Chicago/Kenwood buses are temporarily rerouted via 59th, University, 55th and Woodlawn, due to street blockage near Woodlawn/56th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
